title: Gotham Knights Release Date Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.09.22
description:
Go to http://upstart.com/KINDAFUNNY to find out how much Upstart can lower your monthly payments!

Janet and Tim join forces to talk about Gotham Knights, Final Fantasy's Anniversary, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
Yesterday Greg, Bless, Andrea, and I were in the reveal trailer for Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands endgame mode called Chaos Chamber – which you can see at kindafunny.com/tinytina – but today, Greg’s on the Wondercast at 11 am PT on twitch.tv/gearboxofficial!
After this Mike is playing BOTW for the first time ever raising money for Project Hope benefiting Ukraine. https://kindafunny.com/ukraine
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
The Roper Report   -
